fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- **Watchdog**: Watch a Target, Roleblocking and attacking all visitors, if your target is not visited and they are not a Koopa, you will directly attack them instead.
- **Last Hurrah**: Charge at 2 players, you will attack them both, they must be neighbors in the playerlist, you will die upon using this ability.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - Roleblock Immunity when using second ability.
